title: 141: Love Is Blind FINALE Recap: Episodes 9,10, & 11 (“I DO” or Walk Away FOREVER)
itunes:title: 141: Love Is Blind FINALE Recap: Episodes 9,10, & 11 (“I DO” or Walk Away FOREVER)
description:
It’s finally here, Broads, it’s time to finish up the recapping of Love Is Blind. What a ride it has been! The Broads discuss the final dates, bachelor/ette parties, the shocking, alarming, beautiful weddings of the final couples, and the weird reunion to wrap it up! Thank you all for joining us through this glorious shit show and deciding whether or not love is truly blind!(?)
**Join us Tuesday for our second recap of "The Bachelor’s Listen To Your Heart" and Thursday as we get back into our “non reality tv show” Thursday episodes again! 
INSTAGRAM:
Chatty Broads: @chattybroads
Bekah: @bekah
Jess: @thebaddmom 
THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

*** HIDRATE SPARK: Go to http://hidratespark.com/chatty to get $10 OFF your first order!
*** CARE/OF: For 50% off your first Care/of order, go to TakeCareOf.com (http://takecareof.com/) and enter code chatty50
*** TALKSPACE: Go to Talkspace.com (http://talkspace.com/) or download the app and use code CHATTY to get $100 off your first month!
